CustomField.description: Companies that can't be loaded to other people because they were put in retouch and have recently changed owner.
CustomField.formula: IF(AND(OR(Status__c='Retouch - Confirmed No Opportunity',Status__c='Retouch - Did Not Connect'), TODAY()-DATEVALUE(Account_Assignment_Date__c)<90),True,False)
CustomField.label: Retouch Recently Assigned
